extendedInfo.description: Don't let calculations distract you from decimating your opponents. Â Swiftly deliver justice and punishment to those who oppose you with the Ranger Attack Calculator.Ranger Attack Calculator is the ultimate assistant for any dice-rolling Ranger.Â Â It calculates your attack modifiers based on your character level, dexterity, weapon modifiers, and applicable feats.  With the Ranger Attack Calculator, you aren't bogged down by menial number crunching and can spend more time playing the game.Features:Based on the Revised (v3.5) System Reference DocumentFeats: Weapon FocusGreater Weapon FocusPoint BlankExotic WeaponRapid ShotManyshotAdditional modifiers: Miscellaneous BonusMiscellaneous PenaltyTarget in CoverTarget in MeleeAbility to save and load character information (Level, Dexterity Modifier, and Weapon Modifier)Feel free to contact the developer with any issues, comments, or feature ideas.Copyright Information:Open Game License v 1.0a Copyright 2000, Wizards of the Coast, Inc. System Reference Document Copyright 2000-2003, Wizards of the Coast, Inc.; Authors Jonathan Tweet, Monte Cook, Skip Williams, Rich Baker, Andy Collins, David Noonan, Rich Redman, Bruce R. Cordell, John D. Rateliff, Thomas Reid, James Wyatt, based on original material by E. Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson. You can find more information regarding the SRD content used by this application in the About menu under Content.  Additionally, the complete Open Game License is published in the About menu under OGL.About the Developer: Ashley has many hobbies and interests.Â Â She plays a Ranger in a D&D 3.5 campaign, regularly practices real-life archery at a local archery range, practices art (drawing), and has many tech-related interests none the least of which is developing a variety of apps for her mobile devices.

reviews.title: seems a little incomplete
reviews.comment: lwould definitely rate this higher if it had options for two-weapon Rangers. p, it is now it is only geared towards traditional archer Rangers. As it stands now I an Currently rolling a Dwarven Ranger, So l am currently unable to use this app.
reviews.author: Pierre Browning

reviews.title: The other raters are telling the truth
reviews.comment: Shockingly this app works correctly at least to my ad&d math.... to bad they don\'t mark a second ed. ad&d character sheet that does the same thing. That would be sick.
reviews.author: Jim Brown

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Does what it claims, and is quite handy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: I agree, I\'d like it to save my settings so that I don\'t have to re-enter them every time.  Other than that, no complaints.  Definitely helps cut down on all the mindless calculations id otherwise be doing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, Easy to use!
reviews.comment: This app is a real time-saver.  It\'s fast, there are no ads, and you don\'t need any weird special permissions to run it.  It\'s clear where the attack bonus is, but it\'s a little boring?  Maybe make it bigger?   Also, it\'d be great if the app would save your settings when you close it, although it\'s extremely easy to set it back up, especially since it loads so quickly.  I like the icon.  5/5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app!  Works like the developer promised!
reviews.author: A Google User
